name: 2021 3rd International Conference on Image, Video and Signal Processing
content: The submitted papers will be peer reviewed by Technical Committee. The accepted and registered papers can be published in the International Conference Proceedings ACM (ISBN 978-1-4503-8891-7), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
